titles.title: Open My Eyes That I May See

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Open my eyes that I may see newline Glimpses of truth Thou hast for me; newline Place in my hands the wonderful key newline That shall unclasp and set me free. newline Silently now I wait for Thee, newline Ready my God Thy will to see. newline Open my eyes. Illumine me, Spirit divine!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Open my ears that I may hear newline Voices of truth Thou sendest clear; newline And while the wave-notes fall on my ear, newline Everything false will disappear. newline Silently now I wait for Thee, newline Ready my God Thy will to see. newline Open my ears, Illumine me, Spirit divine!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Open my mouth and let me bear newline Gladly the warm truth everywhere. newline Open my heart and let me prepare newline Love with Thy children thus to share. newline Silently now I wait for Thee, newline Ready my God Thy will to see. newline Open my heart. Illumine me, Spirit divine!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Open my mind that I may read newline More of Thy love in word and deed. newline What shall I fear while yet Thou dost lead? newline Only for light from Thee I plead. newline Silently now I wait for Thee, newline Ready, my God, Thy will to see. newline Open my mind. Illumine me, Spirit divine!
